display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; width: 100%; height: 100%; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
height: 2px

div.div: Core data structures and functionalities for managing the blockchain

div.div: Creates, signs, validates transactions and keeps track of the transaction pool
